summary: This document consists of administrative count sheets and an inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 7, 2019. It records the official inmate count across various housing units and includes a roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, noting his assignment to 'HOSP' (hospital) and a 'SUICIDE WATCH' designation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 76318-054, assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) and under 'SUICIDE WATCH'.

persons.name: Torres
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 85621-054, also assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital).

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total of 763 inmates across various housing units.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate roster shows Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to the hospital (HOSP) and under suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 7, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein's inmate roster entry shows he was assigned to 'HOSP' and under 'SUICIDE WATCH'.
The total inmate count at MCC New York on this date was 763 individuals.
The document is an official administrative record of prison operations and inmate status.
